channel.title: Charter problum any help please
channel.description:
Right guys heres the thing ..
my mate as just downloaded a server base hes new to all this .. but when you log in its fine it says error making file 2times befor it says user connected from etc.. says that on the copiler .
ok i then asked him to seand me the link to download this. it then done the same for me.
but thats not the problum. after say 3-6minutes you get loged off then says error connecting to server and then does the same for every one at the same time it will not let you log in on a other user or a new user you then got to reset it all the time i seen some one post a problum like this on rune server and there was a fix but that was like 2months back .
if any one chud help with this or give us a link that will be grates thanks:)
also please do not comment back and say jsut get a new one he wants this one.

item.title: Charter problum any help please
item.dc:creator: @rob014 rob014
item.description:

Right guys heres the thing …

my mate as just downloaded a server base hes new to all this … but when you log in its fine it says error making file 2times befor it says user connected from etc… says that on the copiler .
